wishlist_db¶

Wishlist.wishlist_db.add_to_wishlist(customer_id, product_id)[source]¶

Adds a product to a customer’s wishlist.

Parameters:

  • customer_id (int) – The ID of the customer.

  • product_id (int) – The ID of the product.

Wishlist.wishlist_db.create_wishlist_table()[source]¶

Creates the Wishlist table in the SQLite database if it doesn’t exist.

The Wishlist table tracks products added to a customer’s wishlist.

Wishlist.wishlist_db.get_wishlist(customer_id)[source]¶

Retrieves all products in a customer’s wishlist.

Parameters:

customer_id (int) – The ID of the customer.

Returns:

A list of wishlist items, including product details and the date added.

Return type:

list of tuples

Wishlist.wishlist_db.remove_from_wishlist(customer_id, product_id)[source]¶

Removes a product from a customer’s wishlist.

Parameters:

  • customer_id (int) – The ID of the customer.

  • product_id (int) – The ID of the product.
